detectors.description:
Twitter.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#37-46) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#39)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#40)
detectors.markdown:
[Twitter.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L37-L46) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balances[msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L39)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L40)

elements.name: balances[from] >= value && allowed[from][msg.sender] >= value && value > 0 && (balances[to] * 10) <= balances[from]

detectors.description:
Twitter.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#49-60) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[from] >= value && allowed[from][msg.sender] >= value && value > 0 && (balances[to] * 10) <= balances[from] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#50)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#51)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#52)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#53)
detectors.markdown:
[Twitter.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L49-L60) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balances[from] >= value && allowed[from][msg.sender] >= value && value > 0 && (balances[to] * 10) <= balances[from]](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L50)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L51)
	- [balances[from] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L52)
	- [allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L53)

detectors.description:
Twitter.smartfastConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#14-79) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 20000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#16)
detectors.markdown:
[Twitter.smartfastConstructorVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L14-L79) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [initialSupply = 20000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#L16)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#4)
	- Twitter.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#23-25)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Twitter.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#29-31)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#5)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#6)
	- Twitter.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#33-35)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#8)
	- Twitter.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#62-66)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#9)
	- Twitter.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol#37-46)
function approve(address spender, uint256 value) public returns (bool success) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol)#62
function transfer(address to, uint256 value) public returns (bool success) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol)#37
function transferFrom(address from, address to, uint256 value) public returns (bool success) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Twitter.sol)#49
